description: Allows the user to create a spherical territory where they can manipulate anything within it, including switching the hearts of people.

abilities.description: Law can remove and switch people's hearts, which he used to deceive Caesar by returning Monet's heart disguised as Smoker's heart.

weaknesses: Standard Devil Fruit weaknesses (sea water, Seastone)

keyMoments.description: Law's heart-switching ability is revealed to have been the key to deceiving Caesar throughout their entire partnership.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the strategic applications of the Ope Ope no Mi beyond combat.

description: Allows the user to transform any part of their body into any weapon, making them a Full-Body Weapon Human.

abilities.description: Baby 5 transforms her entire body into a giant gun barrel and fires rapidly. First named technique shown in the series.
The basic transformation ability that allows Baby 5 to change body parts into various weapons.

weaknesses: Standard Devil Fruit weaknesses (sea water, Seastone)
Transformations can be countered by sufficient physical force

keyMoments.description: Baby 5 debuts her Revolver Girl technique against Franky Shogun, showcasing the offensive capabilities of the Buki Buki no Mi.
keyMoments.significance: First named weapon transformation technique shown for this Devil Fruit.

description: Allows the user to create and manipulate strings from their body, which can be used for various purposes including cutting, controlling people, and creating structures.

abilities.description: Doflamingo attaches his strings to clouds in the sky, allowing him to run through the air and travel great distances. The technique has a weakness: it cannot be used when there are no clouds in the sky.

weaknesses: Standard Devil Fruit weaknesses (sea water, Seastone)
Sora no Michi requires clouds to be present in the sky
Strings can be cut by sharp objects or strong attacks

keyMoments.description: Doflamingo debuts his Sora no Michi (Sky Path) technique, flying through the sky by attaching strings to clouds as he travels from Dressrosa toward Punk Hazard.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals a new application of the Ito Ito no Mi, demonstrating Doflamingo's ability to travel vast distances quickly and establishing the threat of his imminent arrival.
